data.message:
Unfortunately, I  couldn't go to Lollapalooza. I hoped I could watch it on TV, but you, Marshall,  did not allow it. I would like to know WHY??? is there something wrong on your face? Cuz' to me you are charming and hot as you were some years ago!
 Man, how special do you think you are? How big is your ego? If you won't come to Brasil to do a real tour I will hate you forever. I still give a fuck to you! I still love you! 
Brazilian people deserve respect! Say it to your friend Mr. puta.

replies.message: Because broadcast don't pay him. I don't  blame m . Because I wouldn't work for free
Are you rich? Because he is! He has to think about his fans with same love we give to him. He is a star  because of us. I understand the whole thing but don't accept them.
